pr_title: Refactor CacheResultInterceptor exceptions handling and tests

timeline.message: Refactor CacheResultInterceptor exceptions handling and tests

timeline.bodyText: There used to be two code branches and we had to deal with asynchronous cache computations before, but today cache computations are done synchronously on the calling thread so this method has become completely useless.
timeline.author: gwenneg

timeline.bodyText: That was actually wrong, interceptors can throw any Throwable 😄
